features.title: Key Features of {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: {{ProdShortName}} provides powerful tools for indexing and searching text in popular document formats. Simplify and enhance document management with advanced search functionality.

feature_1.title: Advanced text search
feature_1.content: Perform fast and accurate text searches across indexed documents.

feature_2.title: Customizable search options
feature_2.content: Utilize features like fuzzy search, synonyms, and stemming for more precise results.

feature_3.title: Support for multiple formats
feature_3.content: Index and search content in Microsoft Office, PDF, OpenOffice, and other common formats.

feature_4.title: Efficient indexing
feature_4.content: Quickly build and maintain indexes for large document collections.

formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports almost all widely used file formats

code_samples.index_title: Searching text in popular document formats

sample_index.title: Text Search
sample_index.content: {{ProdShortName}} is a powerful tool for finding text in documents. You can search through multiple documents in various formats stored in a specific folder. The search results are saved in a separate folder, allowing you to access and reuse them without running the search again.
sample_index.comment_1: Create an instance of the {{textIndex}} class, specifying the folder for storing indexes.
sample_index.comment_2: Specify the path to the documents where the search will be performed.

sample_index.comment_4: Perform the search for the desired text.
sample_index.comment_5: Handle and process the search results.

sample_1.comment_3: Search for documents containing the word 'water' or the phrase 'Lorem ipsum'

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about {{ProdShortName}}.

item_1.question: Does {{ProdShortName}} require external tools for searching documents?
item_1.answer: No, {{ProdShortName}} works as a standalone solution and does not need additional tools or software like Adobe Acrobat or Microsoft Office to perform searches.

item_2.question: Can I test {{ProdShortName}} before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Yes, you can! {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial. You can explore its features, though the trial version may include limitations such as watermarks or restricted functionality. To unlock all features, you can request a free 30-day temporary license. Learn more on the [temporary license]({{LicensingUrl}}) page.

item_3.question: What licensing options are available?
item_3.answer: We provide several licensing models for {{ProdShortName}}, tailored to different needs. Choose a license based on your team size, usage scenario, or whether you need the SDK/API for client distribution. For flexible usage, consider a metered license where you pay based on actual usage. Learn more about your options on the [pricing]({{PricingUrl}}) page.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Web Apps
app_links.description: Explore {{ProdShortName}} with our free web application. Perform text searches and indexing on over 70 popular file formats directly in your browser—completely free.

item_1.content: Search within PDF, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and other file types straight from your web browser.

item_2.content: Upload DOCX to perform advanced text searches without needing to install software.

item_3.content: Test PDFs indexing and retrieval capabilities on various formats for free.

index-content-net.head_title: {{EnvNameShort}} Document Search and Indexing Library for PDFs, Office Files, and More
index-content-net.head_description: Powerful {{EnvNameShort}} solution for text search and indexing in documents like PDFs, Word, Excel, presentations, emails, and web formats.
index-content-net.title: Advanced Document Search and Indexing with {{EnvNameShort}} API
index-content-net.description: Boost {{EnvNameShort}} applications with cutting-edge text search capabilities across popular document formats.
index-content-net.overview_description: Explore {{EnvNameShort}} {{ProgLang}} library for robust text search and indexing.

overview_feature_1.title: {{EnvNameShort}} Indexing and Search Features
overview_feature_1.description: Efficiently index, store, and process document data with {{ProdFullName}} for highly accurate and fast search operations.

overview_feature_2.title: Combine Indexes for Better Search Speed
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} lets you merge multiple indexes to optimize performance. Reduce the impact of delta indexes by combining them into a comprehensive index for smoother searches.

overview_feature_3.title: Search Across Different Keyboard Layouts
overview_feature_3.description: Easily handle search queries across 88 languages and 164 keyboard layouts with {{ProdFullName}}’s intelligent recognition.

overview_feature_4.title: Morphological Word Searches
overview_feature_4.description: {{ProdFullName}} supports searches for word variations like singular/plural nouns and different verb forms, customizable for various languages.

features.title: Key Features of {{ProdFullName}}
features.description: Streamline document management with advanced search capabilities in popular formats like PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more.

feature_1.title: Flexible Search Parameters
feature_1.content: Use filters like date ranges and case sensitivity to refine your search.

feature_2.title: Smart Spell Check
feature_2.content: Search phrases with spell correction, wildcards, and ignored special characters.

feature_3.title: Filtered Search Results
feature_3.content: Customize and filter search results by document type or criteria.

feature_4.title: Index Import & Export
feature_4.content: Import data, modify indexing settings, and export indexed results.

feature_5.title: Exclude Irrelevant Data
feature_5.content: Optimize indexing by skipping specific files or words.

feature_6.title: URL Extraction
feature_6.content: Convert HTML-formatted text to files and generate links for search results.

feature_7.title: High-Speed Search
feature_7.content: Divide large indexes into smaller parts for faster processing.

feature_8.title: Streamlined Data Handling
feature_8.content: Index documents directly from data streams and structures.

feature_9.title: Misspelling Detection
feature_9.content: Suggest alternative words and track occurrences for improved accuracy.

feature_10.title: Archive Support
feature_10.content: Index nested ZIP archives and retrieve file details within them.

feature_11.title: Efficient Indexing
feature_11.content: Save disk space with compact indexing and process password-protected documents.

feature_12.title: Custom Synonyms
feature_12.content: Add and manage synonyms for tailored search results.

index-content-java.head_title: {{EnvNameShort}} Document Search & Indexing Solution for PDFs, Office Files, and Web Content
index-content-java.head_description: Powerful text search and indexing for {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Easily search and organize data in PDFs, Word, Excel, presentations, emails, and web formats.
index-content-java.title: Efficient Document Search and Indexing with {{EnvNameShort}} API
index-content-java.description: Empower {{EnvNameShort}} applications with robust text search features across all popular document formats.
index-content-java.overview_description: Discover the powerful text search capabilities of the {{EnvNameShort}} {{ProgLang}} library.

overview_feature_1.title: Indexing and Search Operations in {{EnvNameShort}}
overview_feature_1.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can collect, store, and analyze data efficiently to create detailed indexes for faster, more accurate searches.

overview_feature_2.title: Optimize Search by Merging Indexes
overview_feature_2.description: Easily combine multiple indexes with {{ProdFullName}} to streamline searches. Reduce the impact of smaller delta indexes by consolidating them into a single, high-performance index.

overview_feature_3.title: Support for Multilingual Keyboard Layouts
overview_feature_3.description: Search across different languages and keyboard layouts with {{ProdFullName}}. It supports 88 languages and 164 keyboard configurations for unmatched versatility.

overview_feature_4.title: Morphological Search Capabilities
overview_feature_4.description: Find different word forms like singular/plural nouns or verb variations using {{ProdFullName}}. Customize search options for English and other languages.

features.title: Features of {{ProdFullName}}
features.description: Manage document content effectively with advanced search capabilities supporting formats like PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more.

feature_1.title: Customizable Search Parameters
feature_1.content: Refine searches using date ranges and case sensitivity filters.

feature_2.title: Enhanced Spell Check
feature_2.content: Search efficiently with spell check, wildcards, and by ignoring special characters.

feature_3.title: Filtered Search Results
feature_3.content: Apply filters to focus search results based on specific document types or criteria.

feature_4.title: Import and Export Index Data
feature_4.content: Easily import data for indexing or export results to files for further use.

feature_5.title: Skip Unneeded Files
feature_5.content: Optimize indexing by excluding specific files or words.

feature_6.title: HTML and URL Processing
feature_6.content: Extract HTML content to files and generate URLs for navigation through search results.

feature_7.title: Fast Search in Large Indexes
feature_7.content: Speed up search operations by dividing large indexes into manageable chunks.

feature_8.title: Stream-Based Indexing
feature_8.content: Index data directly from streams or data structures.

feature_9.title: Handle Misspelled Queries
feature_9.content: Detect misspellings and suggest alternative words for better search accuracy.

feature_10.title: Comprehensive Archive Support
feature_10.content: Index nested archives and retrieve detailed lists of files within ZIP files.

feature_11.title: Space-Saving Indexing
feature_11.content: Compact indexes to save disk space and process password-protected files.

feature_12.title: Custom Synonym Support
feature_12.content: Expand the synonym dictionary to enhance search accuracy with tailored options.

index-content-nodejs-java.head_title: {{EnvNameShort}} Text Search & Indexing Library for Documents, PDF, Office & Web
index-content-nodejs-java.head_description: Advanced text search solution for {{EnvNameShort}} applications to search, index & collect data from documents: PDF, Word, Excel, presentations, email & web file formats.
index-content-nodejs-java.title: Search & Index Documents using {{EnvNameShort}} API
index-content-nodejs-java.description: Enhance {{EnvNameShort}} Applications by implementing Text Search in All Popular Document Formats.
index-content-nodejs-java.code_title: Perform Text Search in a Folder with {{ProgLang}}

overview_feature_1.title: {{EnvNameShort}} Indexing and Search Operations
overview_feature_1.description: Indexing in {{ProdFullName}} collects, stores, and parses data for precise and efficient search operations. These indexes are frequently used to perform searches.

overview_feature_2.title: Merge Multiple Indexes to Enhance Search Efficiency
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} API allows the merging of multiple indexes into one. Frequent modifications create several delta indexes, which can slow down search performance. Our solution merges these delta indexes into a common index, containing all the information from the merged delta indexes, significantly improving search efficiency while keeping the delta indexes unchanged. Various functionalities can be configured to fine-tune this process.

overview_feature_3.title: Recognize Search Queries from Different Keyboard Layouts
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} recognizes search queries that do not match the keyboard layout. Currently, 88 languages and 164 different keyboard layouts are supported.

overview_feature_4.title: Search Using Morphological Word Forms
overview_feature_4.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can search for various word forms, such as singular and plural nouns, or all forms of a verb. English and non-English languages can be customized for specific word forms.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}} Features
features.description: Control business document content using our advanced search engine, supporting popular file formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more.

feature_1.title: Flexible Parameters
feature_1.content: Use Date Range & Case Sensitivity as Search Parameters

feature_2.content: Use Search Phrases with Spell Check and Wildcards & Skip Special Characters in Queries

feature_3.content: Set up Document Filtering in Search Results

feature_4.title: Import & Export
feature_4.content: Perform Import or Use List to Modify Characters during Indexing & Export to a File

feature_5.title: Skip Unnecessary Data
feature_5.content: Selectively Skip Indexing for Specific Files & Skip Specific Words to Index Faster

feature_6.title: URL Processing
feature_6.content: Extract HTML Formatted Text to a File & Generate URL to Navigate Search Results in HTML

feature_7.title: Rapid Search
feature_7.content: Divide Search into Smaller Chunks to Rapidly Search Large Indexes

feature_8.title: Stream Processing
feature_8.content: Index Documents from Streams and Data Structures

feature_9.title: Handle Misspelling
feature_9.content: Enable Exact Number of Occurrences for each Found Word to Offer Alternative Word Suggestions in case of Misspelling

feature_10.title: Archive Support
feature_10.content: Index Zipped Archives inside other ZIP Archives & Retrieve List of Indexed Files in an Archive

feature_11.title: Disk Space Saving
feature_11.content: Save Space with Compact Indexing & Index Password Secured Documents

feature_12.title: Custom Synonyms
feature_12.content: Add English Synonyms to Default Synonym Dictionary
